component.name: FragmentLength
component.doc: Estimates a fragment length of reads in .bedweight file, shifts the reads by half fragment length and stores .bedweight.shifted in out_dir. It produces a plot with the fragment length correlation.

input.name: in_dir
input.doc: Path to a directory containing a bedfile to process.

input.name: in_file
input.doc: Path to a bedfile to process.

output.name: intermediate
output.doc: Contains intermediate steps and variations of the output.

output.name: out_dir
output.doc: Where to write the output to, contains bed files with shifted reads.

output.name: FragmentLength_plot
output.doc: This plot shows how many reads y on strand (-) are x bp away from a read on strand (+) summed over all reads.

parameter.name: FMIpath
parameter.doc: Path to the FMI pipeline directory. Contains soft and samples directory.

parameter.name: repeatPath
parameter.doc: Path to the repeat mask, of genome (hg19, mm9 etc).

parameter.name: perlPATH
parameter.doc: Path to perl to use for shift_repeats_nwk.pl execution.

parameter.name: fraglen
parameter.doc: Fragment length to used. If this is non-negative, it is used to shift the reads. Otherwise the fragment length is estimated by cross correlation.
